LanguageData.JRWTenontosaurusReconstruct.label: Tenontosaurus
LanguageData.JRWTenontosaurusReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #02321-1970 [TENONTOSAURUS TILLETTI] CODENAME: SINEW >412
A large ornithopod with a slender, elongated tail, theorized to have acted as a whip with which it attacked predators, or perhaps other unruly herd members. They are often preyed upon by dinosaurs which hunt in packs.
